A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was such a great film. It set a premise to step away from the typical Lucas films and demanded to make its own step in the Star Wars universe without trampling on what was already made in the other movies.\n\nIf you have no seen this\, go see it. Make your own opinion about it. Don't let the fake Audience score get to you\, it has a 90+% rating from actual critics for a good reason. You may not like it because it takes a drastic step away from the already set space opera that star wars was\, but you may like it for the fact its changing the star wars universe to something more interesting and open ended.
